Summary: 4 spheres reddish orange new years appear then slowly move around the disappear.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn new year 1 minute after midnight four red spheres appear float around then disappear. 50 witnesses. Alaska time. 2 went south 2 north they would stop remain stationary then move on slowly. The whole thing lasted 1o-11 minutes.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
trends: There has been one other sighting in Willow
There were no other sightings in Willow on or around January 1st 2010
